PEceptor:

Perceptor worked hard in order transition was made quickly ans s=
afely for Reclusa
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, May 23, 2005 6:17 PM
  Subject: Re=
: Reclusa =3D Kestral


  Reclusa=3DKestral::

  She let her optics fade as=
 she felt herself seperate from her form.
  She felt herself floating. Then=
, suddenly, everything was moving at
  light speed. She was swooshing down =
long tunnels, lights flashing past
  and colors of all sorts.  She wondered=
 if this  was what the edge of
  time looked like. Then, she stopped. She w=
as floating in midspace
  inside a giant computer.  It was like a hollow ba=
ll, only, with a
  matrix core in the center of it all.  She floated around=
 it. She heard
  a voice, barely a whisper call her name and her new name. =
It came from
  the matrix core.  She glided towards it. Just as she was abo=
ut to take
  a closer look, lightening flared out and grasped her. She woul=
d have
  screamed, but she was seperated from her body and coudln't make a
=
  sound.  The lightening started to pull her into the matrix core. She
  st=
ruggled and kicked and fought, but it pulled her inside.  Then
  blackness,=
 nothing. No pain, no air, no fear, no happiness, nothing.
  Simple and com=
plete nothing.  Then, she saw a light. It was faint, but
  it was the brigh=
test thing she had ever seen in such blackness.  Then
  a voice reached her=
 audio receptors. It sounded like Perceptor.  She
  felt herself floating t=
owards the sound of Perceptor's voice. 




  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com=
, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
  > Perceptor:
  > 
  > "Kestral, sounds =
nice for a maximal of course.."and looking to the
  femme he said "now my f=
uture and tracherous maximal, just relax and
  let me work...."
  >

 estarted to typed buttons and started to check the monitors about
  spark-=
download proces 
  >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   From: Dark Mouse=
 
  >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  >   Sent: Friday, May 20, 2005 1:59 A=
M
  >   Subject: Re: Reclusa
  > 
  > 
  >   Reclusa::
  > 
  >   She had a=
n indignant tone in her voice. "I am perfectly happy with my
  >   own name=
 thank you very much."  Then logic over ran her regal attitude
  >   protoc=
ol programs. "BUt your right. I will need a new name. Hmm, what
  >   about=
... " She tried not to choke as she let the name escape from her
  >   voca=
l systems. "......Kestral."  She didn't like it, but it did sound
  >   Max=
imal-ish. "Yes, Kestral, a small winged bird of prey. Smallest of
  >   the=
 hawks. Perhaps that might work."  She let her optics glance at
  >   Perce=
ptor. She wondered if he didn't feel sick to his metabolic
  >   processors=
 as much as she did. "Kestral. Kes for short."  She
  >   shuttered. "Ick, =
well, let's hurry up and get this over with. The less
  >   time I have to =
be a Maximush the better."
